name: Knowledge Construct
desc: Contains data from millions of battle simulations involving ships of the designated hull class. Can be integrated to your person to gain specialized piloting expertise.

name: Knowledge Superconstruct
desc: Overflowing with data from countless battle simulations. Can be integrated to your person to gain specialized piloting expertise.
